Main Quests in Baldur's Gate 3

Main Quests in Baldur's Gate 3 can be completed in different ways, and there's room for the player they choose different paths. Completing these quests will make you advance in the main story and are necessary in order to complete the game. It's recommended to complete other quests, explore a
